height: 100%; object-fit: cover; } .collection-image-{{ section.id }} svg { background-color: #AFAFAF; } .collection-button-{{ section.id }} { display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: transition: all 0.25s ease 0s; position: relative; z-index: 2; box-sizing: border-box; } .collection-button-{{ section.id }} svg { width: 14px; height: 14px; } .collection-button-{{ section.id }} svg
